attributes.action: Do Not Make Gender Affirming Surgery Illegal For Under 18s
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of trangender teens suffer from the physical and mental torture of gender dysphoria. A really helpful way to relieve this is by getting gender affirming surgeries such as top and bottom surgery along with others. Banning this would be a huge setback for the acceptance of the LGBTQ+ Community and will likely be overall more harmful to these teens.
attributes.background: There has been debate recently about making gender affirming surgeries illegal for under 18s in the UK. There was also an anouncement for the Equalities Minister. This feels like the world is going backwards. Do not illegalise it!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

Uphold current legal protections for transgender individuals and under 18s:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175

Do not ban gender transition treatments for under 18s:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025

Require schools and colleges to have gender neutral toilets:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302997

Add gender identity to the characteristics protected under the Equality Act 2010:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301138

Introduce Gender and Race equity for GCSE English Literature set texts:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324934

Allow for a gender neutral option on a passport, such as an "X":
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301083
